entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.3
entry.content:
To Make Alpha-and-Omega happy. Numbers reset on the front, fixed a dialogue menu, and some minor UI changes

What's Changed

  • D100 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/264
  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.2.2...6.2.3

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.4

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.6
entry.content:
• Added Whisparr v3 Support
  • Fixed Issues with Banners and Mobile View

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: Huntarr 6.2.13
entry.content:
Huntarr 6.2.13

Windows Installer

The Windows installer includes: - Full Huntarr application - Windows Service support for background operation - Automatic startup option

Installation

  1. Download the installer: Huntarr-Setup-6.2.13.exe
  2. Run the installer and follow the instructions
  3. Optionally install as a Windows service for background operation

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/v6.2.12...v6.2.13
